juding_criteria:
To satisfy the prompt "Replace the office chair with a standing desk" and the Key Requirement "The image must be the result of accurately modifying the conditional image according to the instruction," the final image must contain the following concrete visual elements:

*   Foreground Apple monitor (back view)
*   Foreground plastic water bottle
*   Foreground pink cup with writing utensils
*   Foreground small potted plant with decorative pink bow
*   Foreground small potted cactus
*   Foreground wooden letter tray with paper
*   Foreground silver and white clamped desk lamp
*   Foreground closed silver laptop computer
*   Foreground light-brown wooden desk surface
*   Large out-of-focus green plant leaves (left foreground)
*   A standing desk in the mid-ground (replacing the previous seated-height desk and office chair)
*   Person standing at the mid-ground standing desk (partially visible, right side)
*   Computer monitor on the mid-ground standing desk
*   Desk lamp on the mid-ground standing desk
*   Brightly lit office windows in the background
*   Row of small potted plants on a background windowsill or shelf
*   Other distant office desks and elements consistent with the original background
